# activeInputSource

**Instance Property**

The currently active input source of the device.

## Declaration

```swift
var activeInputSource: AVCaptureDevice.InputSource? { get set }
```

## Discussion

You must call [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/lockForConfiguration()] before attempting to set a format. Setting a format that isn’t present in the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/inputSources] array results in an exception.

This property is key-value observable.

## Configuring input sources

- **inputSources**: An array of input sources that the device supports.
- **AVCaptureDevice.InputSource**: A distinct input source on a capture device.
